label: valueCode
comment: A code specifying a value for this specified range.
A code specifying a value of this document characteristic.
A value, expressed as a code, for this supply chain reference.
The code specifying a value for this calibrated measurement.
The code specifying the value of this agricultural characteristic.
The code specifying the value of this metric characteristic.
The code specifying the value of this organization characteristic.
The code specifying the value of this process characteristic.
The code specifying the value of this product batch characteristic.
The code specifying the value of this sustainability characteristic.
The code specifying the value of this technical characteristic.
The value, expressed as a code, for this inspection reference.
The value, expressed as a code, for this laboratory observation reference.

domainIncludes.comment: A prominent attribute or aspect of an agricultural object.
A measurement established by a device which is tested to a calibration standard of known accuracy.
A prominent attribute or aspect of a document.
The identification of related information for an inspection.
The direction to related information for this laboratory observation.
A prominent attribute or aspect of a metric (a standard of measurement).
A prominent attribute or aspect of an organization.
A prominent attribute or aspect of a process.
A prominent attribute or aspect of a group of products considered or dealt with together.
A row, line or series, commonly used to express the difference between lowest and highest values.
The identification of related information in a supply chain context.
A prominent attribute or aspect of an object, such as recyclability of a product, which can meet customer needs without compromising the ability of future generations to meet their own needs.
A prominent technical attribute or aspect.
